body.name: Mens Balaclava Winter Ski Face Mask Breathable Windproof Thermal for Motorcycle Riding Cycling in Cold Weather Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: PROTECTS YOU AGAINST the ELEMENTS - Protection from freezing temperatures, wind, snow, rain ultraviolet rays, dust, sleet, and other elements. You can use this helmet as a complete mask, or open the helmet as a half-ski mask or scarf.

Softness and warmth: Superfine polar fleece, elastic, extremely comfortable and warm. Polar wool provides extra protection. This non-irritating fabric is light, breathable, without pilling, deformation, fading and strange smell. EASY BREATH: mesh breathing panels prevents fogging up your glasses or goggles; Sewing process to increase its lifespan.

Full face coverage: This mask allows you to choose to cover the entire face and has an extra-long neck part, providing excellent wind and cold protection; it is very suitable for outdoor activities, such as motorcycles, bicycles, skiing, skiing, mountaineering, and hiking Travel, or just to kill time in cold weather.

Be confident when buying: head circumference should not exceed 25 inches for men and women. If you have any size problems or you are not 100% satisfied with our ski masks, please feel free to contact our customer support. Our headwear products are guaranteed for one year.

SUPERFINE POLAR FLEECE: Get the most comfort out of your experiences. The Polar Fleece offers extra warmth and protection, even when temperatures are freezing; This non-irritating fabric is lightweight, stretchy, soft and breathable with no pilling, deformation, fading and weird smells.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: FanVince balaclava uses a non-irritating fabric, which is light, elastic, soft, breathable, and will not pilling, deforming, fading and smelling. You can cover the entire face and have an extra-long neck, which provides excellent wind and cold protection.Protect you from the sun’s UV rays, the dust brought by riding.Absords sweat and will keep you dry.Making it ideal for outdoor activities such as Skiing, Snowboarding, Motorcycles, Bicycles, Mountaineering Hunting, Tactical Training and Hiking.FanVince face mask is perfect for those who work in construction, freight/baggage, drilling/mining, oil/gas refining, iron/steel, delivery/service, landscaping/grounds, warehousing, and working in refrigerated areas.

Softness & warmth Superfine polar fleece fabric is soft, extremely comfortable and warm. Polar wool provides extra protection. This non-irritating fabric is light, breathable, without pilling, deformation, fading and strange smell. Better breathing&Prevent fogging The mesh breathing paneling at the mouth provides excellent breathability without feeling stifled or stuffy, and prevents fogging of glasses or goggles; minimizes condensation on the goggles.The use of exquisite sewing technology it fits your face better and can extend the service life. One Size fit all Recommend for men or women with a head circumference of 21.5“-25.5”. FanVince mask offers longer neck coverage area for better wind and cold resistance. The front length is 17“, and the back length is 15.5”.Two color: Black, Gray.Wear your balaclava on its own or under a helmet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks like this is going to be a very nice, warm face and head warmer. More to come with how warm it keeps you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Kept my face nice and warm when the weather dropped to 14 degrees definitely going to keep one in my locker for work just in case.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Keeps you warm
reviews.reviewText: Very thermal mask and comfortable. Wish the neck cover was a tad bigger but that's because I like baggy. You can wear it but mostly without glasses/sunglasses, they fog up and is a little uncomfortable but that's ok, it works. It was a little difficult to breathe but I also don't like things on my face. It gets the job done, really good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This Balaclava fits great and is easy to adjust to cover more/less head and face. The material also appears nice and to be well made. It seemed a bit loose until I washed it, then it fitted my face much better with just minimal shrinkage. We'll see how it holds up on the ski slopes! I'm very happy with this purchase so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kept me warm on nightshift
reviews.reviewText: Hood arrived timely and fit perfect. The price was right and had the quality of high price name brand thermal hoods. 👍👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not windproof as advertised, too big.
reviews.reviewText: It's advertised as being windproof, but other than the strip of material on the front between the eyes and bottom it is not windproof or even wind resistant. The fleece is reasonably thick and provides plenty of warmth, but 85% of this mask has no wind resistance. It also too thick to wear with a motorcycle helmet unless you have a second helmet that's a size too large. Also, I'm 6 feet and 225 pounds, no one would describe my head as small but this is very loose on me, I think it's sized for Sasquatch. For warmth it gets an A, but for sizing and wind resistance it gets a D.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got what I expected. I like how you can flip the top back, like a hat. I also like the breathable mesh fabric in front so condensation isn't so bad when breathing out of your mouth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my long walk to work
reviews.reviewText: I used this the day after it arrived and we had been under wind advisory’s for two or three days and it was still -25 with the wind chill at the time I left my house but it was amazing keeping my face warm. After 45 minutes of walking I felt great because my face wasn’t cold at all like it normally was before this purchase very pleased with my purchase.
